item.title: Arduino
item.description:
Arduino is an open source single-board microcontroller for building digital devices and interactive objects that can sense and control objects in the physical world. Arduino boards are available commercially in preassembled form, or as do-it-yourself kits. Wikipedia Research Agriculture: Soil Moisture Monitoring Smart City/Smart Home: Smart Garbage, $30 Home Automation System, Environmental Monitoring Industry: Smart Supply Chain
Series Comparison … Arduino CPU SRAM Flash Yún 400 MHz 64 MB 16 MB Uno 16 MHz 2 KB 32 KB 101 32 MHz 24 KB 196 KB Micro 16 MHz 2.

item.title: RPi
item.description:
The Raspberry Pi is a series of popular small and low-cost single-board computers. It was first developed in the UK by the Raspberry Pi Foundation. Manifold products have been created to accompany, modify, and enhance the Pi’s capabilities. Wikipedia Research Health Monitoring, Web of Things Book, Industrial Automation, Environmental Monitoring
Series Comparison RPi CPU RAM WiFi 3 4 x 1.
